section.subtitle: Dubai's #1 AI call center handles house cleaning bookings, garden maintenance, appliance repairs, and all home services 24/7 - perfect for busy homeowners.
key_benefits: Book house cleaning services instantly - weekly, deep clean, or post-construction
Schedule garden maintenance - lawn care, tree trimming, landscaping consultations
Arrange appliance repairs - washing machines, AC units, refrigerators
Coordinate painting projects - interior, exterior, touch-ups
Handle Arabic & English inquiries for all UAE demographics

voice_demo.title: Live House Cleaning Booking Demo
voice_demo.description: Real conversation with AI agent handling weekly cleaning service booking
voice_demo.transcript: Customer: 'I need weekly cleaning for my 3-bedroom apartment in Marina.' AI: 'Perfect! For a 3-bedroom in Marina, our team uses eco-friendly products and brings all equipment. Available slots: Tuesday 9 AM or Thursday 2 PM? Each session takes 3-4 hours and includes bathroom deep cleaning, kitchen sanitization, and floor mopping.'

metadata.target_audience: UAE home service providers, repair companies, maintenance businesses, cleaning services
